text: hi everyone thanks to your support we
have been selected at once of the
finalists to joy a foot tour and attend
the final cook-off event in Seoul this
is a shot we love of our trip to share
with you the experience we decided to
have a walk around Gangnam area to get
our first impression of soon while
waiting for the other teams to arrive
the weather was extremely nice and it
was so beautiful in autumn when the
leaves started changing colors when I
saw these dreadful stores I just
couldn't resist myself they looked just
like what I used to see in Korean movies
and dramas we stopped by and grab
ourselves some Korean dumplings Manju
and fish cake skewers don't know why but
I'm always fascinated by street food
stores
we tried quite a few strict snacks
forgetting the fact that there was a
very big Welcome Dinner awaiting us at
the Welcome Dinner the director of soon
tourism office welcomed us with a
massive banquet with almost 30 different
gourmet Korean dishes they were our
Korean delicacy and I guess many of the
dishes are not known to even local
Koreans Catalina we head out to the
stream to adore Co lantern festival it
was very pretty
[Music]
we started day two with a visit to
Korea's most famous royal palace
yeonbok own palace we also got to watch
the changing of the guard ceremony at
the main gate after that we visited a
teahouse in bukchon hanok village to
experience Korean traditional culture
there we tried the Korean fruit tea on
Miyata with some Korean cookies
Hanwha and yucca then we went to the
kitchen to attend the kimchi making
class even though I had made kimchi
myself many times before I've learned
many new things through this class
afterwards we enjoyed the kimchi with
some Korean rice wine McCauley and then
try on the Korean traditional clothes it
was really cool do I look like a queen
in this handbook for lunch we went to a
very famous restaurant to try the Korean
teams and chicken soup
I would hold this is the favorite place
to eat Samia tongue of the ex prime
minister of Korea in the afternoon we
also went shopping and also visited the
Namsan tower which is the highest point
in Seoul on the third day we two arousal
on a city tour bus and then stopped at a
broadcasting station to attend a cooking
class by a very famous Korean celebrity
chef he taught us how to make Korean
spring onion pancake pan Jeon then we
went to a local market among warm to
shop for ingredients for our competition
on the next day
[Music]
also on this day we got to join many
other delicious Korean food like Korean
mix rice
bibimbap grilled pork Samuel say etc the
final contest took place at Seoul City
Hall with a massive presence of many
Korean media I was overwhelmed with the
amount of cameras and microphones
plotting at my working station at I
prepared a bougie spin rose we were
taught to cook two dishes in 40 minutes
one Korean fusion dish of our own and a
mystery dish which turned out to be the
spring onion pancake our creations were
judged by a board of five Korean
celebrities foodies and in the end po
and Josephine was announced winning the
grand prize we also went shopping in
Insadong Myeongdong in Hongdae but then
again I was always drawn to those
amazing street foods that was a shot
summer or my trip to Korea last week
thank you so much for your support
making my Korean dream come true and
please stay tuned for the giveaway
contest that follows thank you for
watching bye bye
[Music]
